title: Wamsutta Hotel MicroCotton Reversible Duvet Cover at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Create a tailored hotel look in your bedroom with the luxurious Wamsutta Hotel MicroCotton Reversible Duvet Cover. Adorned with a color block border and spun up in a sumptuous 100% extra-long staple cotton weave using very fine yarns for a soft touch. Thanks for watching.
transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] Exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond, the reversible Hotel Frame duvet cover and pillow shams by Wamsutta are part of the Wamsutta Hotel Frame collection. This beautifully designed bedding features a wide border that brings a tailored, modern look to your bedroom. 

The reversible Hotel Frame duvet cover and pillow shams are made of 100% micro-cotton fabric. Micro-cotton is woven using extra long staple cotton, which has very fine yarns, resulting in a bed that is ultra-soft and luxurious. 

Matching Euro and standard pillow shams complete this timeless look. Additional Hotel Frame colors are available in a pallet of sophisticated neutrals, giving you many choices to personalize your bedroom. The reversible Hotel Frame duvet covers and pillow shams by Wamsutta are available exclusively online, and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
